constraints.search: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP OR type=FILE OR type=IOADAPT OR type=PROC OR type=PROCSOL OR type=PAGE OR type=VM

objects.displayName: I/O Adapters Read/Write Operations (IOADAPT) - AIX Only
Threads in run queue and to be paged (RunQueue, Swap-In)
Fork and Exec Systems Calls (fork, exec)
Fs In / Fs Out (sum of pgin/pgsin and pgout/pgsout per interval)
Scan Free Ratio (Pages scans by reclaims per interval)
Percentage of Memory Allocation (MEMNEW) - AIX Only

outputFields.displayName: Data Transfer Rate for read/write Operations

objects.displayName: Percentage Inode Usage of File-Systems (JFSINODE) - AIX Only
Percentage of Time spent by processes (PROCSOL) - SOLARIS Only
Transfer of data between system buffers and disk or other block device
